title: Caviness Beef Packers Recalls Beef Products Due to Possible E. Coli O103 Contamination
summary: WASHINGTON, Sept. 27, 2016 Caviness Beef Packers, a Hereford, Texas establishment, is recalling approximately 2,100 pounds of boneless beef trim products that may be contaminated withE. coli O103, the U.S. Department of Agricultures Food Safety and Inspection Service (FSIS) announced today. The 2,100-lb. Combo Bin...
